content: <articles>    <article xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink/">   <front>     <article-meta>       <title-group>         <article-title>Discoverability and 21st Century Scholarly Communication: A local perspective</article-title>       </title-group>       <contrib-group>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname/>             <given-names/>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>OpenUCT Initiative</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>       </contrib-group>       <pub-date pub-type="pub">         <year>2014</year>       </pub-date>       <self-uri xlink:href="http://zenodo.org/record/8483"/>       <self-uri xlink:href="http://openuct.uct.ac.za/blog/promoting-discoverability-african-scholarship"/>       <self-uri xlink:href="https://zenodo.org/record/8483/files/Discoverability_workshop_setting_the_scene_Willmers.ppt"/>     </article-meta>     <abstract><p>Opening presentation to the Carnegie workshop on Discoverability of African Research. &nbsp;</p></abstract>   </front>   <article-type>user-scholarafrica</article-type> </article>   </articles>
